name: 1 - Cover aggregate supplied by a quarry registered and operated in accordance with DTMR's Quarry Registration System requirements. Submitted to Administrator 7 days prior to supply
2 - Material from a quarry shall not be supplid or used without written permission from the Administrator
3 - Construction procedure shall be submited to the administrator atleast 7 days prior to the commencement of aggregate production for the works
4 - The cover aggregate particles shall comply with the requirements of Table 7.1.3 of MRTS22
5 - Where precoated cover aggregate is specified the Contractor shall submit to the Administrator 7 days prior, the procedure to be used for application of the precoating agent
6 - If stated in Clause 3 of MRTS22.1, a sample of 40kg of each type of aggregate to be used shall be supplied to the Administrator 14 days prior to use.
7 - Prior to commencement of delivery of aggregate to any stockpile, the Contractor shall obtain the Administrators authorisation
8 - Except for prime cover materials, all cover aggregate stockpiles shall be protected with a light plastic material
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Max. Lot Size, Min. Testing Frequency, Min. No. of Tests
10 - Material compliance testing shall be conducted in accordance with the requirements of MRTS22 Cl. 8.3
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Refer to Table 8.3.2(a) and 8.3.2(b)
Project Manager Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
